game.name: Cosmic collapse
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 레이싱, 시뮬레이션
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Lasers, blasters, black holes and a lot of enemies... All this is in the endless space, the expanses of which you have to clean up from enemies!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lasers, blasters, black holes and a lot of enemies... All this is in the endless space, the expanses of which you have to clean up from enemies!
